resource.chars: 一　　　清閑寺禅侶權少僧都幸済与吉田大納言家

item.value: <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"><path xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" d="M3992,3840h-218v-3840h218v1920.0z" data-paper-data="{"strokeWidth":1,"rotation":0,"deleteIcon":null,"rotationIcon":null,"group":null,"editable":true,"annotation":null}" id="rectangle_06e92947-fe80-4b4a-b0ca-228018c7beca" fill-opacity="0" fill="#00bfff" fill-rule="nonzero" stroke="#00bfff" stroke-width="1" stroke-linecap="butt" stroke-linejoin="miter" stroke-miterlimit="10" stroke-dasharray="" stroke-dashoffset="0" font-family="none" font-weight="none" font-size="none" text-anchor="none" style="mix-blend-mode: normal"/></svg>

resource.chars: 雑掌相論當寺内辻坊幷敷地等事

item.value: <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"><path xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" d="M3706,3840h-219v-3840h219v1920.0z" data-paper-data="{"strokeWidth":1,"rotation":0,"deleteIcon":null,"rotationIcon":null,"group":null,"editable":true,"annotation":null}" id="rectangle_06e92947-fe80-4b4a-b0ca-228018c7beca" fill-opacity="0" fill="#00bfff" fill-rule="nonzero" stroke="#00bfff" stroke-width="1" stroke-linecap="butt" stroke-linejoin="miter" stroke-miterlimit="10" stroke-dasharray="" stroke-dashoffset="0" font-family="none" font-weight="none" font-size="none" text-anchor="none" style="mix-blend-mode: normal"/></svg>

resource.chars: 如幸済申者當坊者吉田大納言家被官人信濃左

item.value: <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"><path xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" d="M3434,3840h-234v-3840h234v1920.0z" data-paper-data="{"strokeWidth":1,"rotation":0,"deleteIcon":null,"rotationIcon":null,"group":null,"editable":true,"annotation":null}" id="rectangle_06e92947-fe80-4b4a-b0ca-228018c7beca" fill-opacity="0" fill="#00bfff" fill-rule="nonzero" stroke="#00bfff" stroke-width="1" stroke-linecap="butt" stroke-linejoin="miter" stroke-miterlimit="10" stroke-dasharray="" stroke-dashoffset="0" font-family="none" font-weight="none" font-size="none" text-anchor="none" style="mix-blend-mode: normal"/></svg>

resource.chars: 衛門入道妙宗帯　院宣等證文相傳之地也仍子息

item.value: <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"><path xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" d="M3117,3840h-214v-3840h214v1920.0z" data-paper-data="{"strokeWidth":1,"rotation":0,"deleteIcon":null,"rotationIcon":null,"group":null,"editable":true,"annotation":null}" id="rectangle_06e92947-fe80-4b4a-b0ca-228018c7beca" fill-opacity="0" fill="#00bfff" fill-rule="nonzero" stroke="#00bfff" stroke-width="1" stroke-linecap="butt" stroke-linejoin="miter" stroke-miterlimit="10" stroke-dasharray="" stroke-dashoffset="0" font-family="none" font-weight="none" font-size="none" text-anchor="none" style="mix-blend-mode: normal"/></svg>

resource.chars: 左近将監令相續為彼坊留守居住之間料足拾貮

item.value: <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"><path xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" d="M2472,3840h-218v-3840h218v1920.0z" data-paper-data="{"strokeWidth":1,"rotation":0,"deleteIcon":null,"rotationIcon":null,"group":null,"editable":true,"annotation":null}" id="rectangle_06e92947-fe80-4b4a-b0ca-228018c7beca" fill-opacity="0" fill="#00bfff" fill-rule="nonzero" stroke="#00bfff" stroke-width="1" stroke-linecap="butt" stroke-linejoin="miter" stroke-miterlimit="10" stroke-dasharray="" stroke-dashoffset="0" font-family="none" font-weight="none" font-size="none" text-anchor="none" style="mix-blend-mode: normal"/></svg>

resource.chars: 貫文令傳借畢借状云若不致返弁者此坊舎敷地幷

item.value: <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"><path xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" d="M2131,3840h-201v-3840h201v1920.0z" data-paper-data="{"strokeWidth":1,"rotation":0,"deleteIcon":null,"rotationIcon":null,"group":null,"editable":true,"annotation":null}" id="rectangle_06e92947-fe80-4b4a-b0ca-228018c7beca" fill-opacity="0" fill="#00bfff" fill-rule="nonzero" stroke="#00bfff" stroke-width="1" stroke-linecap="butt" stroke-linejoin="miter" stroke-miterlimit="10" stroke-dasharray="" stroke-dashoffset="0" font-family="none" font-weight="none" font-size="none" text-anchor="none" style="mix-blend-mode: normal"/></svg>

resource.chars: 文書等悉入置質物之上者可為永領契約也爰彼

item.value: <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"><path xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" d="M1848,3840h-200v-3840h200v1920.0z" data-paper-data="{"strokeWidth":1,"rotation":0,"deleteIcon":null,"rotationIcon":null,"group":null,"editable":true,"annotation":null}" id="rectangle_06e92947-fe80-4b4a-b0ca-228018c7beca" fill-opacity="0" fill="#00bfff" fill-rule="nonzero" stroke="#00bfff" stroke-width="1" stroke-linecap="butt" stroke-linejoin="miter" stroke-miterlimit="10" stroke-dasharray="" stroke-dashoffset="0" font-family="none" font-weight="none" font-size="none" text-anchor="none" style="mix-blend-mode: normal"/></svg>

resource.chars: 将監男令逐電之間任借状幸済自専仕之處主人

item.value: <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"><path xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" d="M1590,3840h-224v-3840h224v1920.0z" data-paper-data="{"strokeWidth":1,"rotation":0,"deleteIcon":null,"rotationIcon":null,"group":null,"editable":true,"annotation":null}" id="rectangle_06e92947-fe80-4b4a-b0ca-228018c7beca" fill-opacity="0" fill="#00bfff" fill-rule="nonzero" stroke="#00bfff" stroke-width="1" stroke-linecap="butt" stroke-linejoin="miter" stroke-miterlimit="10" stroke-dasharray="" stroke-dashoffset="0" font-family="none" font-weight="none" font-size="none" text-anchor="none" style="mix-blend-mode: normal"/></svg>

resource.chars: 吉田大納言家掠給　院宣押領云々如支状者彼坊舎

item.value: <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"><path xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" d="M1269,3840h-190v-3840h190v1920.0z" data-paper-data="{"strokeWidth":1,"rotation":0,"deleteIcon":null,"rotationIcon":null,"group":null,"editable":true,"annotation":null}" id="rectangle_06e92947-fe80-4b4a-b0ca-228018c7beca" fill-opacity="0" fill="#00bfff" fill-rule="nonzero" stroke="#00bfff" stroke-width="1" stroke-linecap="butt" stroke-linejoin="miter" stroke-miterlimit="10" stroke-dasharray="" stroke-dashoffset="0" font-family="none" font-weight="none" font-size="none" text-anchor="none" style="mix-blend-mode: normal"/></svg>

resource.chars: 敷地等者當家舊跡為稱号之地帯　院宣之上者可有

item.value: <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"><path xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" d="M986,3840h-183v-3840h183v1920.0z" data-paper-data="{"strokeWidth":1,"rotation":0,"deleteIcon":null,"rotationIcon":null,"group":null,"editable":true,"annotation":null}" id="rectangle_06e92947-fe80-4b4a-b0ca-228018c7beca" fill-opacity="0" fill="#00bfff" fill-rule="nonzero" stroke="#00bfff" stroke-width="1" stroke-linecap="butt" stroke-linejoin="miter" stroke-miterlimit="10" stroke-dasharray="" stroke-dashoffset="0" font-family="none" font-weight="none" font-size="none" text-anchor="none" style="mix-blend-mode: normal"/></svg>

resource.chars: 進退之由被申之然者可被出本文書之旨重被仰之

item.value: <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"><path xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" d="M770,3840h-251v-3840h251v1920.0z" data-paper-data="{"strokeWidth":1,"rotation":0,"deleteIcon":null,"rotationIcon":null,"group":null,"editable":true,"annotation":null}" id="rectangle_06e92947-fe80-4b4a-b0ca-228018c7beca" fill-opacity="0" fill="#00bfff" fill-rule="nonzero" stroke="#00bfff" stroke-width="1" stroke-linecap="butt" stroke-linejoin="miter" stroke-miterlimit="10" stroke-dasharray="" stroke-dashoffset="0" font-family="none" font-weight="none" font-size="none" text-anchor="none" style="mix-blend-mode: normal"/></svg>

resource.chars: 處舊跡證據稱号所見共以無之由載状被申彼状下給幸済僧都

item.value: <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"><path xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" d="M444,3840h-188v-3840h188v1920.0z" data-paper-data="{"strokeWidth":1,"rotation":0,"deleteIcon":null,"rotationIcon":null,"group":null,"editable":true,"annotation":null}" id="rectangle_06e92947-fe80-4b4a-b0ca-228018c7beca" fill-opacity="0" fill="#00bfff" fill-rule="nonzero" stroke="#00bfff" stroke-width="1" stroke-linecap="butt" stroke-linejoin="miter" stroke-miterlimit="10" stroke-dasharray="" stroke-dashoffset="0" font-family="none" font-weight="none" font-size="none" text-anchor="none" style="mix-blend-mode: normal"/></svg>

resource.chars: 争以近年之院宣壹通可被弃置相傳文書哉此上者
